title: 如何把地皮禁止刷怪和禁止刷动物
author: zyw5

replies.author: nuli
replies.txt_content:
在Multiverse-Core /worlds.yml 
找这个
  animals:
      spawn: true
    monsters:
      spawn: true
把这俩修改为false

replies.author: zyw5
replies.txt_content:
nuli 发表于 2015-3-7 09:23
在Multiverse-Core /worlds.yml 
找这个
  animals:
我要指令!

replies.author: nuli
replies.txt_content:
zyw5 发表于 2015-3-7 09:28
我要指令!
好像没指令吧！我只知道在这里面修改
举个例子
 world:
    seed: 6494152414920349669
    environment: NORMAL
    type: FLAT
    hidden: false
    alias:
      name: ''
      color: WHITE
    pvp: true
    scale: 1.0
    respawnworld: ''
    allowweather: true
    difficulty: EASY
    animals:
      spawn: true            <<<修改为false 
    monsters:
      spawn: true            <<<修改为false 

    entryfee:
      currency: -1
      price: 0.0
    hunger: true
    autoheal: true
    adjustspawn: true
    portalform: ALL
    gamemode: SURVIVAL
    keepspawninmemory: true
    spawn:
      x: 573.0
      y: 134.0
      z: -775.0
      pitch: 0.0
      yaw: 0.0
      world: world
    autoload: true
    bedrespawn: true

replies.author: 帅杀风云110
replies.txt_content:
试试指令
/mv modify set diff 0

replies.author: 尼克尼
replies.txt_content: 在想要的世界打/gamerule doMobSpawing false
